static.title: Krita Configuration Management Tool
static.error-temp-del-fail: Failed to delete temporary files (program root directory/temp). Reason: {$e}. Please delete manually.
static.error-krita-is-on: Please close Krita before applying the configuration!
static.error-select-conflict: This operation can only select one configuration group!
static.error-krita-is-unk: Unable to confirm Krita running status. Attempting to apply configuration.
static.input-name_disagreement: This configuration group name '{$name}' conflicts with an existing group. Please rename it.
static.error-platform-conflict: Import failed: Configuration group '{$name}' is from the '{#config-platform}' platform, which differs from your '{#platform}' platform. Conversion is currently unsupported.
